game.name: Chicken TD: Defenders of the Coop
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Workshop, Stats, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Chicken TD is a unique tower defense game where you strategically summon and upgrade creature towers to defend your coop from waves of enemies, while also engaging in Souls-like melee combat with a chosen weapon to directly hold the line and collect meta-progression currency.
